question: The difference output of a full subtractor is same as ____________

answers.c: Output of 3- bit even parity generator

question: If minuend = 0, subtrahend = 1 and borrow input = 1 in a full subtractor then the borrow output will be __________
A serial subtractor can be obtained by converting the serial adder by using the ____________
A basic multiplexer principle can be demonstrated through the use of a _____
In the given 4-to-1 multiplexer, if C₁ = 0 and C₀ = 1 then the output M is _____.
In multiplexer IC 74153, if both enable inputs are high, selection inputs S₀=0 and S₁=1 then outputs Za and Zb will be ____ and ____ respectively
The output Za and Zb are respectively present at pin no. ______ and ______ of multiplexer IC 74153

answers.a: 8 to 1 multiplexer IC with inverted output
answers.b: 16 to 1 multiplexer IC with non inverted output
answers.c: Dual 4 to 1 multiplexer IC with inverted output

question: What is data routing in a multiplexer?

answers.a: It spreads the information to the control unit
answers.b: It can be used to route data from one of several sources to destination
answers.c: It is an application of multiplexer
answers.d: Both, it can be used to route data and it is an application of multiplexer
